original_title: Colombo fire brigade’s emergency numbers temporarily out of order
original_body_lines: The Fire Service Department of the Colombo Municipal Council (CMC) says its emergency contact numbers 110 and 0112 422 222 are out of order at the moment due to a technical error.
Hence, in the event of an emergency, the members of the public are urged to contact the Colombo fire brigade via its general contact number 0112 686 087 until the situation is rectified.
